org.helm.notation.tools

Class SimpleNotationParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.helm.notation.tools.SimpleNotationParser

  • public class SimpleNotationParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods that handle simple polymer notation. It is unlikely that they will be called by clients directly.
    Author:
    zhangtianhong

      • getStrictNucleotideList

        public static java.util.List<Nucleotide> getStrictNucleotideList(java.lang.String polymerNotation,
                                                 boolean validate)
                                                          throws NotationException,
                                                                 MonomerException,
                                                                 java.io.IOException,
                                                                 org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                                                 StructureException
        getNucleotideList is a more forgiving function that will try to substitute the natural sequence where possible to provide information for queries. This getStrictNucleotideList routine is more strict in that it will utilize modX for a natural seuqence X or include ? for unknown bases.
        Parameters:
        polymerNotation -
        validate -
        Returns:
        list of nucleotide
        Throws:
        NotationException
        MonomerException
        java.io.IOException
        org.jdom.JDOMException
        StructureException

      • processNode

        protected static java.lang.String processNode(java.lang.String nodeDesc,
                           java.lang.String polymerType,
                           java.lang.String naturalAnalog,
                           MonomerStore monomerStore)
                                       throws NotationException
        This method preprocesses the monomer node. If the monomer is not contained in the monomerStore, the system will generate a temporary monomer and add it to the monomer store
        Parameters:
        nodeDesc - - in the format of ID or extended smiles
        polymerType - (RNA,CHEM,PEPTIDE)
        naturalAnalog - Analog - natural analog of temporary monomer (if one is created)
        monomerStore -
        Returns:
        monomer alternateID
        Throws:
        MonomerException
        java.io.IOException
        org.jdom.JDOMException
        NotationException
